title: Problem-Based Physical Assessment Skills Enhancement Program for Pharmacy Students

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Simulation Stethoscope Utilization and Practice-Centered Education through Small-Group Collaborative Learning

learning_goals: Students can perform respiratory and circulatory system physical assessment skills with 80% accuracy via problem-centered scenario analysis.
An average score improvement of over 60% is achieved in post-learning knowledge assessment surveys.
Confidence in performing physical assessments reaches 3 or higher on a 5-point Likert scale.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
